Title: Establishes the offense of aggravated reckless driving
Summary: Establishes the offense of aggravated reckless driving and allows for the seizure and forfeiture of vehicles used in connection with reckless driving or aggravated reckless driving.
LawCode: Add ยง1212-a, amd ยง511-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing the offense of aggravated reckless driving
